channel.title: Deltascape - ::yell command
channel.description:
I need help in making a ::Yell command only available for Mod+.
For example if the person uses yell it shows this.
[Mod] Luke: Hi. [Admin] Luke: Hi. [Owner] Luke: Hi.

item.title: Deltascape - ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

if (command.startsWith("owneryell") && command.length() > 6 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Luke")){
String text = command.substring(6);
yell("[Owner] "+playerName+":  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
if (command.startsWith("modyell") && command.length() > 6 && playerRights >= 2){
String text = command.substring(6);
yell("[Mod] "+playerName+":  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
if (command.startsWith("adminyell") && command.length() > 6 && playerRights >= 3){
String text = command.substring(6);
yell("[Admin] "+playerName+":  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

NOTE My server is a modified Delta server, so you may have to configure the yell(" part of the commands, to your send message to all option. It may be something like c.sMtoAll or something similar.

Read full topic
